autofocus.title: Autofocus
autofocus.description: Specifies that a text area should automatically get focus when the page loads

cols.title: Columns
cols.description: Specifies the visible width of a text area

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: Specifies that a text area should be disabled

maxlength.title: Max length
maxlength.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the text area

name.title: Name
name.description: Specifies a name for the text area

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of a text area

readonly.title: Read-only
readonly.description: Specifies that a text area should be read-only

required.title: Required
required.description: Specifies that a text area is required/must be filled out

rows.title: Rows
rows.description: Specifies the visible number of lines in a text area

wrap.title: Wrap
wrap.description: Specifies how the text in a text area is to be wrapped when submitted in a form
